This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL Serializing a WebAssembly.Memory-backed ArrayBuffer works Failed to execute 'postMessage' on 'Window': ArrayBuffer is not detachable and could not be cloned.
FAIL Transfering a WebAssembly.Memory-backed ArrayBuffer throws assert_throws_js: function "() => {
    postMessage('foo', '*', [buffer]);
  }" did not throw
Harness: the test ran to completion.
